title: Biomarker Manual
text:
The place to find example code and recommendations for biomarkers by indication.
Use the search bar to type in a biomarker name or variant. Or, browse the side navigation by indication.

title: About
text:
Biomarker recommendations will be updated quarterly. Each page will indicate whether the code has been updated for the current quarter’s data release.
Biomarker recommendations are based on what has been confirmed by looking in EMOL patient records, and inconsistencies that may be present. The goal is to be as thorough as possible, but if you see something that needs to be changed, please let me know. [link to email or jira]
If you do not see the biomarker or variant that you need, it may be in progress. However, just in case, submit your biomarker, variant, and indication here. [link to email or jira]
** Of Note**: When pulling biomarker records from GN360, it is necessary to query both genetic_test and patient_test tables. We found that in some cases, for some genes/biomarkers, there are patients listed in patient_test that are not in genetic_test. Because of this, please remember to query both tables.
Abbreviations  - AA: amino acid  - CDS: coding sequence

title: EGFR E709
text:
Code updated for Q4 2022
This variant, located on exon 18, is a single nucleotide missense mutation changing Glutamic Acid (Glu) to another amino acid, commonly to Aspartic Acid (Asp).
This is not as common of a mutation as others like L858R and G719X, so numbers of patients with detected/positive results are going to be low.
AA mutation: p.E709A, p.E709K, p.E709V, p.E709Q, p.E709D, p.E709G  CDS mutation: c.2127A>C, c.2125G>A, c.2126A>T, c.2126A>G, c.2126A>C, other others

title: EGFR E709
text:
Example code: PT360
select chai_patient_id,
       test_name_name,
       test_date,
       test_collection_date,
       genetic_test_type_name,
       test_method_name,
       molecular_variant_name,
       test_value_name

from c3_pt360_202212_nsclc.patient_test
where test_name_name ilike '%EGFR%' and
      molecular_variant_name similar to '%(E709|e709|codons 709)%' and
      test_value_name = 'Positive';

title: EGFR E709
text:
Example code: GN360
select chai_patient_id,
       test_name_name,
       test_date,
       genetic_test_type_name,
       test_method_name,
       molecular_variant_name,
       'p.E709X' as protein_alteration,
       test_value_name
from c3_gn360_202212_nsclc.patient_test
    where test_name_name like '%EGFR%' and molecular_variant_name similar to '%(E709|e709|codons 709)%'
    and test_value_name = 'Positive'


UNION

select chai_patient_id,
       biomarker_name as test_name_name,
       report_date as test_date,
       biomarker_test_type as genetic_test_type_name,
       'NGS or PCR' as test_method_name,
       dna_alteration as molecular_variant_name,
       protein_alteration,
       test_result as test_value_name
from c3_gn360_202212_nsclc.genetic_test
where biomarker_name = 'EGFR' and protein_alteration like 'p.E709%' and
test_value_name = 'Positive'

title: EGFR E709 variant
text:
Notes on Results

In the results, there are some records that come up with molecular_variant_name (PT360) or dna_alteration (GN360) as c.2127_2129delAAC and protein_alteration as p.E709_T710>D or p.E709T710delinsD. You may want to check with your client or consider if this would be acceptable. Luckily, as of Q4 2022, there are only 3 records with these results, so it won’t decrease counts much.

title: EGFR G719X
text:
Code updated for Q4 2022
This variant, located on exon 18, is a single nucleotide missense mutation changing Glycine (Gly) to another amino acid, commonly to Alanine (Ala).
AA mutation: p.G719X (X could be D, A, R, S, C, or possibly others)  CDS mutation: c.2155G>A, c.2155G>C, c.2155G>T, c.2156G>A, c.2156G>C

title: EGFR G719X
text:
Example Code: PT360
select chai_patient_id,
       test_name_name,
       test_date,
       test_collection_date,
       genetic_test_type_name,
       test_method_name,
       molecular_variant_name,
       test_value_name,
       curation_indicator
       from c3_pt360_202212_nsclc.patient_test
    where test_name_name like '%EGFR%' AND
          molecular_variant_name similar to '%(G719|Gly719|c.215_G)%' and
          molecular_variant_name <> 'G7195 8709 a' and
          test_method_name not in ('Immunohistochemistry or immunocytochemistry, per specimen; initial single antibody stain procedure',
                                  'Molecular cytogenetics; DNA probe, each (eg, FISH)') and
          lower(genetic_test_type_name) not similar to '%(amp|del)%' and 
          test_value_name = 'Positive';

title: EGFR G719X
text:
Example Code: GN360
select chai_patient_id,
       test_name_name,
       test_date,
       genetic_test_type_name,
       test_method_name,
       molecular_variant_name,
       'p.G719X' as protein_alteration,
       test_value_name

from c3_gn360_202212_nsclc.patient_test

where test_name_name like '%EGFR%' and
      molecular_variant_name similar to '%(G719|Gly719|c.215_G)%' and
          molecular_variant_name <> 'G7195 8709 a' and
          test_method_name not in ('Immunohistochemistry or immunocytochemistry, per specimen; initial single antibody stain procedure',
                                  'Molecular cytogenetics; DNA probe, each (eg, FISH)') and
      lower(genetic_test_type_name) not similar to '%(amp|del)%'
      and test_value_name = 'Positive'

UNION

select chai_patient_id,
       biomarker_name as test_name_name,
       report_date as test_date,
       biomarker_test_type as genetic_test_type_name,
       'NGS' as test_method_name,
       dna_alteration as molecular_variant_name,
       protein_alteration,
       test_result as test_value_name
from c3_gn360_202212_nsclc.genetic_test
where biomarker_name = 'EGFR' AND
          protein_alteration similar to '%G719%'and
          test_value_name = 'Positive';

title: EGFR G719X
text:
Notes and Recommendations

Notice that IHC and FISH are being removed as test methods. There is some evidence that there are ways to identify some variants of EGFR via IHC, but after checking the patient records that have these methods listed, it was actually found that the test method should be listed as PCR or NGS. The patient(s) marked as having FISH as a method is also incorrect.
Note that genetic test types similar to '%(amp|del)%' are being removed. This is removing Gene amplification and Gene deletion. These are inaccurate since this is a missense mutation.

title: EGFR E709
text:
Notes and Recommendations

In the results, there are some records that come up with molecular_variant_name (PT360) or dna_alteration (GN360) as c.2127_2129delAAC and protein_alteration as p.E709_T710>D or p.E709T710delinsD. You may want to check with your client or consider if this would be acceptable. Luckily, as of Q4 2022, there are only 3 records with these results, so it won’t decrease counts much.

title: EGFR L858R
text:
Code updated for Q4 2022
L858R usually refers to a missense point mutation located on exon 21. However, keep in mind that there are an inversion and an indel that are also labeled as p.Leu858Arg, but AA mutation notation is c.2572_2573inv, and c.2573_2574delinsGT, respectively.
CDS mutation: c.2573T>G, c.2572_2573inv, c.2573_2574delinsGT  AA mutation: p.L858R, p.Leu858Arg

title: EGFR L858R
text:
Example Code: PT360
select chai_patient_id,
       test_name_name,
       test_date,
       test_collection_date,
       genetic_test_type_name,
       test_method_name,
       molecular_variant_name,
       replace(molecular_variant_name, ' ', '') as molecular_variant_name_clean,
       test_value_name,
       curation_indicator
from c3_pt360_202212_nsclc.patient_test
where test_name_name ilike '%EGFR%'
    and lower(molecular_variant_name_clean) similar to
           '%(l858r|l85r|2573t>g|2573t&g|2573t.g|t2573g|2573_2574deltginsgt|2572_2573del|2572_2573ct>a|2572-2573ct>ag|leu858arg)%' and
    genetic_test_type_name not in ('Genomic structural variant copy number','Gene amplification') and
    test_method_name not similar to '%ish%|%in situ%';

title: EGFR L858R
text:
Example Code: GN360
select chai_patient_id,
       test_name_name,
       test_date,
       genetic_test_type_name,
       test_method_name,
       molecular_variant_name,
       'p.L858R' as protein_alteration,
       replace(molecular_variant_name, ' ', '') as molecular_variant_name_clean,
       test_value_name
from c3_gn360_202212_nsclc.patient_test
where test_name_name ilike '%EGFR%'
    and lower(molecular_variant_name_clean) similar to
           '%(l858r|l85r|2573t>g|2573t&g|2573t.g|t2573g|2573_2574deltginsgt|2572_2573del|2572_2573ct>a|2572-2573ct>ag|leu858arg)%' and
    genetic_test_type_name not in ('Genomic structural variant copy number','Gene amplification') and
    test_method_name not similar to '%ish%|%in situ%'

UNION

select chai_patient_id,
       biomarker_name as test_name_name,
       report_date as test_date,
       biomarker_test_type as genetic_test_type_name,
       'NGS' as test_method_name,
       dna_alteration as molecular_variant_name,
       protein_alteration,
       replace(molecular_variant_name, ' ', '') as molecular_variant_name_clean,
       test_result as test_value_name
from c3_gn360_202212_nsclc.genetic_test
where biomarker_name = 'EGFR' and protein_alteration = 'p.L858R';

title: EGFR del19
text:
Code updated for Q4 2022
Deletion in exon 19 can be a deletion in different locations on exon 19 of EGFR. Because of this, it can be complicated to capture all of the diversity of annotations in the data.
Common CDS mutation (among others): c.2235_2249del, c.2239_2251del  Common AA mutation (among others): p.E746_A750del, p.L747-A750>P, p.L747_S752del

title: EGFR del19
text:
Example Code: PT360
select chai_patient_id,
       test_name_name,
       test_date,
       test_collection_date,
       genetic_test_type_name,
       test_method_name,
       molecular_variant_name,
       replace(molecular_variant_name, ' ', '') as molecular_variant_name_clean,
       test_value_name

from c3_pt360_202212_nsclc.patient_test
where test_name_name ilike '%EGFR%'
  and (lower(molecular_variant_name) similar to '%(del%ex%19|ex%19%del|exon deletion 19|e746_a750|c.2236_2250delgaattaagag aagca (p.glu746_ala750del)| ' ||
                                                'p.l74l_s752del|exon 19 e746_a750|p.glu746_ala750del|del19 (p.e746_a650del)|del 19|c.2235_2249del|' ||
                                                'del%e746_a750|l747_a750>p|exon 19 p.e746_a750|e746_a750delinsv|del%19|e746_1750del|l747_p753‚àö√â¬¨√á‚àö√á¬¨¬™S|' ||
                                                'exon 19 l747_t51|746-a750|l747_t751del|e746 a750del|p.l747_p753delinss (c.2240_2257del18)|' ||
                                                'e746_r748del|e746-a750|exon 19 glu746-ala750|exon 19 c2236_2250 del|e746_a750%del|c.2235-2249del15|exon 19, l747_a750|' ||
                                                'p. l747_s752|e746-a750 del|exon 19 e746-a750|e746-a750del|p.l747_pro753delinss|del%e746_a750|s752_i759del|p.glu746_ala750del|' ||
                                                'exon 19 p.e746-s752|exon 19 p.e746_a750delelrea (c.2235_2249del15)|l747_a750>p|leu747-a1a750|exon 19 pE746_A750|c.2240_2257del|' ||
                                                'e746_l747%del|l747_t751del|c.2235_2249del|l747-a750 del|e746_l747>1p|l747_a750del/insp|p.l747_p753del lrearsp>s|' ||
                                                'p.glu746-ala750|p.e746_a70|c.2239_2248delinsc(p.l747_a750delinsp|c.2235_2249del (p. e746_a759del)|e748-a750del|glu746-ala750 deletion|' ||
                                                'glu746_ala750del|p.747-T751delins|p.glu746-ala750|c.2236_2250del|glu 746_ala750|p.l747_p753del|glu746_ser752delins|e746_a750del|' ||
                                                'glu746-ala 750|glu 746-ala 750 deletion|c.2240_2254del(p.l747_t751 del)|exon 19 ae 746-a750|e19del|exon 19%l747_t751|e19del|' ||
                                                'c.2235_2249del;2250a>g p.delglu746_ala750|exon 19, l747_t751del|exon 19 deletion (p.leu747_ala750delinspro)|e746_a750del5|' ||
                                                'c.2239_2251delinsc;p.l74-t751delinsp|exon 19 - c.2236_2250|p.l747_t751del|p.e746-t751 del/ins|L747_P753delins|2235-2249del(p.e750del)|' ||
                                                'e19glu746-ala750 deletion|p.e746_t751>a or p.e746_s752>a exon 19|exon 19 p. e746 a750|p.e746_t751delinsa|c.2239_2256deliostca(p.l747_t751del)|' ||
                                                'l747_a750delinsp;2239_2248delinsc|c.2235-2249del (p.e746-2750del)|c.2235_2249del15|c.2236_2250del;p.e746_a750d|exon 19 p.l747_a750|' ||
                                                'exon 19; e746-a750|e746-a750|p.l747-p753|exon18-p.e746_t751|p.glu746_ala750del|glu_746_ala750del|e756_a750del5|p.l747_a755del/ins|' ||
                                                'p.l747_t751|c.2236_2244delgaattga|c.2235-2249del))%'
    and genetic_test_type_name not in ('Genomic structural variant copy number','Not Recorded''Gene rearrangement','Gene amplification','Genomic Structural Variation') and
        lower(test_method_name) not similar to '%ish%|%in situ%') or
    (lower(genetic_test_type_name) in ('gene deletion', 'deletion mutation')
                and (lower(molecular_variant_name) similar to '%(ex%19|l747_t751|e746_a750|l747 exon 19|e746_t751|p.l747_t751|lrea 747-750 exon 19|exon 19,S752_I759)%'
                     or molecular_variant_name = '19'));

title: EGFR del19
text:
Example Code: GN360
select chai_patient_id,
       test_name_name,
       test_date,
       genetic_test_type_name,
       test_method_name,
       molecular_variant_name,
       'p.E746_A750del' as protein_alteration,
       replace(molecular_variant_name, ' ', '') as molecular_variant_name_clean,
       test_value_name

from c3_gn360_202212_nsclc.patient_test
where test_name_name ilike '%EGFR%'
  and (lower(molecular_variant_name) similar to '%(del%ex%19|ex%19%del|exon deletion 19|e746_a750|c.2236_2250delgaattaagag aagca (p.glu746_ala750del)| ' ||
                                                'p.l74l_s752del|exon 19 e746_a750|p.glu746_ala750del|del19 (p.e746_a650del)|del 19|c.2235_2249del|' ||
                                                'del%e746_a750|l747_a750>p|exon 19 p.e746_a750|e746_a750delinsv|del%19|e746_1750del|l747_p753‚àö√â¬¨√á‚àö√á¬¨¬™S|' ||
                                                'exon 19 l747_t51|746-a750|l747_t751del|e746 a750del|p.l747_p753delinss (c.2240_2257del18)|' ||
                                                'e746_r748del|e746-a750|exon 19 glu746-ala750|exon 19 c2236_2250 del|e746_a750%del|c.2235-2249del15|exon 19, l747_a750|' ||
                                                'p. l747_s752|e746-a750 del|exon 19 e746-a750|e746-a750del|p.l747_pro753delinss|del%e746_a750|s752_i759del|p.glu746_ala750del|' ||
                                                'exon 19 p.e746-s752|exon 19 p.e746_a750delelrea (c.2235_2249del15)|l747_a750>p|leu747-a1a750|exon 19 pE746_A750|c.2240_2257del|' ||
                                                'e746_l747%del|l747_t751del|c.2235_2249del|l747-a750 del|e746_l747>1p|l747_a750del/insp|p.l747_p753del lrearsp>s|' ||
                                                'p.glu746-ala750|p.e746_a70|c.2239_2248delinsc(p.l747_a750delinsp|c.2235_2249del (p. e746_a759del)|e748-a750del|glu746-ala750 deletion|' ||
                                                'glu746_ala750del|p.747-T751delins|p.glu746-ala750|c.2236_2250del|glu 746_ala750|p.l747_p753del|glu746_ser752delins|e746_a750del|' ||
                                                'glu746-ala 750|glu 746-ala 750 deletion|c.2240_2254del(p.l747_t751 del)|exon 19 ae 746-a750|e19del|exon 19%l747_t751|e19del|' ||
                                                'c.2235_2249del;2250a>g p.delglu746_ala750|exon 19, l747_t751del|exon 19 deletion (p.leu747_ala750delinspro)|e746_a750del5|' ||
                                                'c.2239_2251delinsc;p.l74-t751delinsp|exon 19 - c.2236_2250|p.l747_t751del|p.e746-t751 del/ins|L747_P753delins|2235-2249del(p.e750del)|' ||
                                                'e19glu746-ala750 deletion|p.e746_t751>a or p.e746_s752>a exon 19|exon 19 p. e746 a750|p.e746_t751delinsa|c.2239_2256deliostca(p.l747_t751del)|' ||
                                                'l747_a750delinsp;2239_2248delinsc|c.2235-2249del (p.e746-2750del)|c.2235_2249del15|c.2236_2250del;p.e746_a750d|exon 19 p.l747_a750|' ||
                                                'exon 19; e746-a750|e746-a750|p.l747-p753|exon18-p.e746_t751|p.glu746_ala750del|glu_746_ala750del|e756_a750del5|p.l747_a755del/ins|' ||
                                                'p.l747_t751|c.2236_2244delgaattga|c.2235-2249del))%'
    and genetic_test_type_name not in ('Genomic structural variant copy number','Not Recorded''Gene rearrangement','Gene amplification','Genomic Structural Variation') and
        lower(test_method_name) not similar to '%ish%|%in situ%') or
    (lower(genetic_test_type_name) in ('gene deletion', 'deletion mutation')
                and (lower(molecular_variant_name) similar to '%(ex%19|l747_t751|e746_a750|l747 exon 19|e746_t751|p.l747_t751|lrea 747-750 exon 19|exon 19,S752_I759)%'
                     or molecular_variant_name = '19'))

UNION

select chai_patient_id,
       biomarker_name as test_name_name,
       report_date as test_date,
       biomarker_test_type as genetic_test_type_name,
       'NGS' as test_method_name,
       dna_alteration as molecular_variant_name,
       protein_alteration,
       replace(molecular_variant_name, ' ', '') as molecular_variant_name_clean,
       test_result as test_value_name
from genetic_test
where biomarker_name = 'EGFR' and
      (dna_alteration ilike '%del%' and
      dna_alteration not in ('c.2127_2129delAAC','c.2154_2155delinsTT','c.2303_2305delinsTCT','c.2317delCinsTACCCCAACCCCT','c.2303_2305delinsTCT',
                             'c.2311_2312delinsGGGTT','c.2317delCinsTACCCCAACCCCT','c.2335_2336delinsTT','c.2572_2573delinsAG','c.888_889delinsTT',
                             'c.2573_2574delTGinsGT','c.2709_2710delinsCA','c.2827_2828delinsAC','c.3158delA','c.443_444delinsCT','c.447delG','c.746_751del',
                             'c.P753del') and
      protein_alteration <> 'p.G719A') OR
      protein_alteration similar to '%(E736[:_]|A750[:_]|p.E746[:_]|L747[:_]|T751[_:]|E746del|S752[:_])%';
